column4: if i build a package from source will it overwrite the package installled from synaptic?
if a ./configure runs once but warns of not having libhal-storage-dev and libhal-storage1 can i run ./configure again and all will be ok?
in general, you can run configure as many times as you like. But if it needs libhal-storage-dev and you don't have it, eventually the compile will fail...
i know, i am installing what it needs now.
you don't have to write a startup scrip to get an app to start after bootup. just put the command you'd run from a terminal in the startup apps within system , preferences
